page.title: 07TUNSTEAD QUARRY:CONSERVATION
page.content: Conservation is very important in quarrying.Normally promises have to be made to conserve the countryside.This {does not apply to Tunstead Quarry}as it was opened before this law was made.Tunstead quarry is expanding onto{Old Moor}and{ICI} have had to agree with the Peak Park Planning Board to conserve this area.Tunstead Quarry is a well-designed and situated quarry as it is{unnoticed from the {road}until you are actually inside it. One reason for this is because of {trees planted around the quarry. There have been suggestions about the future of the quarry when ICI is done with it.It may be used as a{ {leisure centre}or a{football arena. { } There are models showing how it might be possible to landscape the the quarry.
